title: Tivo SaaS Template
body:
‘Tivo’ is a free HTML SaaS Landing Page template built by[ Inovatik](https://inovatik.com/). Features include sticky header navigation with links that scroll seamlessly to page sections. A clean services overview and lightbox feature carousal, video modal, pricing table, testimonial slider and working forms for service sign up, log in as well as a newsletter sign up. Check out the [live demo](https://inovatik.com/tivo-landing-page/index.html)!
![Tivo SaaS Template](/images/uploads/tivo.jpg)
